drinks.name: Bumbo
drinks.description: Sword Coast spice mix, Chultian dark rum, limes from the Greenhouse Arcana in Silverymoon, and sugar-free sweet from prestidigitation nation.

drinks.name: Knee of Bee
drinks.description: In-house free-range apiary honey, local organic herb-infused neutral spirit, cruelty-free lemon juice

drinks.name: Old Fashioned
drinks.description: Proprietary blend of Waterdhavian whiskey, Agave Spirit imported from Darkhold, a bitters from the Apothecary of Candlekeep

food.name: Dragon Egg Benedict
food.description:
Poached Dragon Egg*, Luskandaise, choice of sourdough or flapjills.
*Not real dragon egg...

food.name: Crock of Beef
food.description: Braised beef, savory stock, barrel-aged salt.

food.name: Basilisk Filet
food.description: Chef's specialty, only the choicest cut of Basilisk tail steak. Cooked rare, no exceptions.

food.name: Elven Hard-tack
food.description: You pay for the intellectual property as well as the hearty nourishment offered by these delicious cakes. Serves 12.
